mapper.update:
update SYS_ROBOT_CORPUS_AUDIO_AND_VIDEO
SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MEDIA_NAME = #{mediaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIA_NAME_PING_YIN = #{mediaNamePingYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIA_AUTHOR = #{mediaAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIA_AUTHOR_PING_YIN = #{mediaAuthorPingYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIA_TYPE = #{mediaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where MEDIA_ID = #{mediaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_ROBOT_CORPUS_AUDIO_AND_VIDEO set SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MEDIA_NAME = #{mediaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIA_NAME_PING_YIN = #{mediaNamePingYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIA_AUTHOR = #{mediaAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIA_AUTHOR_PING_YIN = #{mediaAuthorPingYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIA_TYPE = #{mediaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIA_RESOURCES_TYPE = #{mediaResourcesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIA_URL = #{mediaUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MEDIA_ID = #{mediaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.*, B.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME AS scenicSpotName FROM SYS_ROBOT_CORPUS_AUDIO_AND_VIDEO A LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT B ON A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = B.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
(A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId} OR A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = 2019924)
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
